page.title: 15NEWSPAPERS IN STOW
page.content: The{North Cotswold Standard}is a truly local paper for it has its office in Digbeth Street, Stow. It circulates in an area bounded by Chipping Campden, Chipping Norton, Moreton, Bourton and Charlbury. The Office has a staff of two. Circulation is about 8000 copies per week. School mergers, Carnivals, planning applications and marriages provide the news stories. An article featuring our Domesday Project was recently published. The paper is a subsidiary of the{Wilts & Glos {Standard,}a{Bailey Newspaper. The{Gloucestershire Echo}is the local evening paper, published in Cheltenham and the district also comes within the area of the{Evesham Journal & Four {Shires Advertiser.
